name: SOS Ministries Mission Field
description: SOS (Save Our Souls) Ministries is a Christian organization dedicated to rescuing victims of sex trafficking and drug addiction. Founded in 2016, they provide extraction services, emergency rescue, placement in recovery programs, and long-term rehabilitation support. Their mission is to strategically remove women and men from dangerous situations and help them recover through faith-based programs.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online sources
hours_of_operation: 24/7 emergency response for rescue operations. Office hours vary - call for availability.
eligibility_requirements: Victims of sex trafficking and drug addiction. Services available to women and men in crisis situations across America.
populations_served: Victims of sex trafficking, individuals struggling with drug addiction, homeless populations, and those in crisis situations.
cost_information: Free services. Organization relies on donations and volunteers to operate.
